getConnectionTimeout

public int getConnectionTimeout()
Returns the HTTP connection timeout in millisecond. Default is 5000 milliseconds.

Returns:
the connection timeout

setConnectionTimeout

public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the HTTP connection timeout in millis. 0 for no timeout.

Parameters:
timeout - HTTP connection timeout in millis

setTrustMaterial

public void setTrustMaterial(String cadirname)
                      throws PEPClientConfigurationException
Sets the directory containing the trust material X509 certificates used to authenticate the server side of a secure socket (server authentication). This is typically the EUGridPMA bundle directory /etc/grid-security/certificates

Parameters:
cadirname - the directory containing the CA issuing certificates in PEM format. This is typically the EUGridPMA bundle directory /etc/grid-security/certificates
Throws:
PEPClientConfigurationException - if an error occurs processing the cadirname or creating the trust manager

setTrustMaterial

public void setTrustMaterial(KeyStore truststore)
                      throws PEPClientConfigurationException
Sets the trust material X509 certificates used to authenticate the server side of a secure socket (server authentication).

Parameters:
truststore - the trust store containing the trusted server certificates or issuing CA certificates.
Throws:
PEPClientConfigurationException - if an error occurs creating the trust manager

setKeyMaterial

public void setKeyMaterial(String usercert,
                           String userkey,
                           String password)
                    throws PEPClientConfigurationException
Sets the key material X509 certificate-based key pairs used to authenticate the client side of a secure socket (client authentication). The certificate and private key must be in PEM format.

Parameters:
usercert - the filename containing the X509 certificate in PEM format
userkey - the filename containing the private key in PEM format
password - the password of the private key, and of the resulting keystore. It can not be null.
Throws:
PEPClientConfigurationException - if an error occurs reading the key material or creating the key manager

getTrustManager

public X509TrustManager getTrustManager()
Gets the trust manager if any

Returns:
the X509TrustManager or null if no trust material have been defined

getKeyManager

public X509KeyManager getKeyManager()
Gets the key manager if any

Returns:
the X509KeyManager or null if no key material have been defined

getMaxConnectionsPerHost

public int getMaxConnectionsPerHost()
Gets the maximum number of connections per host to keep alive. Default is 5.

Returns:
maximum number of connection per host

setMaxConnectionsPerHost

public void setMaxConnectionsPerHost(int connectionsPerHost)
Sets the maximum number of connections per host to keep alive.

Parameters:
connectionsPerHost - maximum number of connections per host
See Also:

getMaxTotalConnections

public int getMaxTotalConnections()
Gets the maximum total number of connections in the connections pool. Default is 20.

Returns:
maximum total number of connections
